sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { LineChart, Line, PieChart, Pie, Cell, BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, Legend } from "recharts"; import "./AdminHome.css"; import axios from "axios"; const COLORS = ["#0088FE", "#00C49F", "#FFBB28", "#FF8042"]; export default function AdminHome() { const [stats, setStats] = useState({ wasteCollected: 1500, wasteProcessed: 1200, carbonSavings: 5200, activeFarmers: 200, activeProviders: 50, }); const [satisfactionRatings, setSatisfactionRatings] = useState([ { name: "Farmers", rating: 0 }, { name: "Providers", rating: 85 }, ]); useEffect(() => { // Fetch the farmer satisfaction rating axios .get("http://localhost:8085/reviews/average") .then((response) => { const farmerRatingOutOf5 = response.data.averageRating; const farmerRatingOutOf100 = (farmerRatingOutOf5 / 5) * 100; setSatisfactionRatings((prevRatings) => [ { name: "Farmers", rating: farmerRatingOutOf100 }, prevRatings[1], ]); }) .catch((error) => console.error("Error fetching satisfaction rating:", error)); }, []); const wasteCollectionData = [ { month: "Jan", waste: 150 }, { month: "Feb", waste: 250 }, { month: "Mar", waste: 300 }, { month: "Apr", waste: 450 }, { month: "May", waste: 500 }, { month: "Jun", waste: 600 }, ]; const wasteDistributionData = [ { name: "Organic", value: 45 }, { name: "Bio", value: 25 }, { name: "Farm", value: 20 }, { name: "Others", value: 10 }, ]; const pendingActions = [ "5 farmer profile approval requests.", "3 unresolved service disputes.", "8 unmoderated marketplace listings.", ]; return (
{/* Welcome Banner */}

Analytics Overview

Waste Distribution

Farmer Satisfaction Ratings

{/* Pending Actions */}

Pending Actions

    {pendingActions.map((action, index) =>
  • {action}
    • )}
{/* Footer */}

Support: admin-support@example.com | Phone: +1234567890

Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

“Together, let’s build a sustainable future.”

); }
